A revision of a recent level of mine based on your feedback. It's a short, tricky level that should be easy.
If you aim to hit the goal at lowest possible point you will get by him. You can do it more reliably if you land on the last cannon and jump from there.

I Came To Stomp Bombs - Wow, I beat it. I like how I had to make choices. Nothing felt cheap to me. This is one of the best multi-path levels I've played. I ended up kicking the bombs that came out of the sideways tube very carefully to open up a little hole for little Mario to edge out and jump for the flag. I know there must have been other ways but I kept getting stuck.
Please try my Rebounding level or the easier one, Cheesy Meadows that I posted above and let me know what you think.

Level Title: Rebounding
ID: 20CD-0000-0067-1605
Description of Gameplay Elements: After throwing my body at Pit of Panga: P-Break last week, I decided to create a tutorial level to teach players how to overcome it's first obstacle. You must jump, then kick a shell while in air into a spring and then bounce off the shell and over some spikes. My level helps you build up to it. Let me know if this is helpful or fun at all. I might make other tutorial levels for the seemingly impossible kaizo type challenges that aren't so impossible if you isolate them.
Video: https://youtu.be/SveqwVIOojY
Section 1: Demonstrates bouncing over the spikes on a Bullet Bill.
Section 2: When you kick a shell into the spring, you will notice that is bounces back raised off the ground. In order to pass the wall you will have to bounce off it while it is off the ground. It helps me to have a running start.
Section 3: Similar to the Pit of Panga start but with a walkway underneath to prevent insta-death. Jump, kick the shell at the spring, bounce off it and over the spikes as the shell rebounds toward you.
Section 4: Same thing, but without training wheels.
OR
